use.flag: Use media-gfx/fontforge to build fonts from source
Don't fix errors in character mapping

pkgmetadata.longdescription: A GPL-2 Helvetica/Times/Courier replacement TrueType font set, courtesy of Red Hat. vishal-vvr fork adds unicode characters 25d0-25d7 which relate to circles. I have patched in even more glyphs which are by no means works of art, but try to utilise existing glyphs as much as possible to look authentic
